source_sentence: 不空悉地王真言　　則得見於補陀山

source_sentence: 七寶宮殿觀世音　　及見西方寶宮殿

source_sentence: 阿彌陀佛諸菩薩　　亦見十方諸剎土
translation: The bodhisattvas Amitâbha also see all the buddha-fields of the ten directions
